den enda skilnaden är att jag kopierat system filerna så du behöver inte ändra några filer för att spela eller för att ha datorn som en lan server.

för att lägga ut den online så gör du så här
1.) Go to www.no-ip.com or www.dyndns.com and create a free account.
2.) go to www.whatismyip.com and write down your IP address.
3.) Log in at no-ip or dyndns and create a static IP that directs to your IP you got from www.whatismyip.com
4.) Press the windows start button and select run. Type in cmd and hit run.
5.) in the command prompt type in ipconfig and write down the IP it gives you next to the word "IP Address" above (subnetmask) (eg 192.168.1.101) Write down the address it gives you next to "default gateway"
6.) Enter the address you got next to default gateway into an internet browser (firefox or IE). Forward your ports 8080, 8085, and 3724. (i recommend to forward 1-65535 to allow almost everyone to play).
7.) Open the realmlist table in the realmd database in navicat and edit the ip to the your static IP from no-ip or dyndns.
8.) lastly open "hosts.ics" with notepad in C:\WINDOWS\system32\drivers\etc. Edit it and add at the bottom:
127.0.0.1 yourstaticdns
youripaddress yourstaticdns
yourexternalip yourstaticdns
where "yourstaticdns" is the IP you got from no-ip or dyndns, "youripaddress" is the address next to IP address in ipconfig, and "yourexternalip" is the ip you got from whatismyip.com.
